divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and her sister told me about this sighting that happened 2 years ago in los angeles, ca. they saw a triangle craft with blue and green lights. they saw it from the balcony of their apartments. they said they never saw anything like it, and it has weird movements. it also had a visible trail. when they found a camera to photograph it, the thing was gone but it left a trail. i am submitting the photograph she emailed me. please email me at beastamerica@yahoo.com if you find this interesting too. i still can ask her questions, but guide me on what relevant questions to ask.
Summary: triangle UFO with green and blue lights, trail photographed
